original_text:
to satisfy the waste and desolate land,
    and to make the ground sprout with grass?
korean_text: 황무하고 황폐한 토지를 흡족하게 하여 연한 풀이 돋아나게 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: to satisfy the waste and desolate land
and to make the ground sprout with grass?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅에서 풀이 돋아나게 하기 위해?
